description: Adds an alert feedback submitted by customer.

comment.description: Additional comments related to the alert.

consentedtoshare.description: Indicates if the alert feedback can be shared from product team.

api_version.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

servicememberid.description: The server Id of the alert.

createddate.description: The date and time,in UTC,when the alert was created.

level.description: The alert level which indicates the severity of the alert.

state.description: The alert state which can be either active or resolved with multiple resolution types.

feedback.description: The feedback for the alert which indicates if the customer likes or dislikes the alert.
